snippet.title: Edge Of Galaxy | Real-Time Tactical Space Sim With RPG Elements
snippet.description:
Edge of Galaxy is a real-time tactical space sim with RPG elements. You are the commander of a small fleet of mercenaries. Manage your fleet! Hire and dismiss, adjust and improve every ship, and increase your rank and glory!

Wishlist today so you don't miss the next sale!
Epic Games Store➡️https://bit.ly/Edge-Of-Galaxy-Epic
Steam➡️https://bit.ly/Edge-Of-Galaxy-Steam

Edge of Galaxy is a real-time tactical space sim with RPG elements. You are the commander of a small fleet of mercenaries. Manage your fleet! Hire and dismiss, adjust and improve every ship, and increase your rank and glory!

✅Indirect control gives a new sensation to the strategy and makes you think ahead.
✅An advanced system of various weapons and modules combined lets you adjust your spaceships as you wish. Each support module attached to a weapon changes its parameters or abilities. Create your own weapon for your own tactics!
✅5 playable factions. Each faction has unique traits and abilities.
✅Gain experience and ranks in battles. Use it to improve and fine-tune your fleet's ships.
✅5 different campaigns.
✅Explore game mode with small maps.
✅One-life mode with a randomly generated world. Each game is unique. You have a lot of parameters to tune the world you want to play!
✅Text quests with different ways to complete depending on the parameters of your fleet or commander.
